newsitem.title: USA: Franklin Mutual says holds Advanta shares.
newsitem.headline: Franklin Mutual says holds Advanta shares.

text.p: Franklin Resources Inc, the mutual fund group managed by Michael Price, said on Friday that it holds more than three million shares of Advanta Corp.
Advanta shares surged 2-15/16 to close at 27-1/2 on 1.56 million shares traded.
Michael Price, the president and chief executive of Franklin Mutual Advisers, is known for finding undervalued stocks and spurring managements to boost shareholder value.

The mutual fund group acquired 2.54 million shares of class B shares and 511,700 class A shares during the first quarter, Franklin Resources said in a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission.
Total holdings for the mutual fund group could not immediately be determined.

Last month, Advanta's chief executive officer said the company is on track for "marginal profitability" in the second quarter and Advanta posted a first quarter loss after it took a large provision for possible loan losses.
Advanta representatives were not immediately available for comment.
Advanta has approximately 46.2 million shares outstanding.
